bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Providing Accountability Through Transparency Act of 2015
(Sec. 2) Requires the general notice of proposed rule making by a federal agency to include the Internet address of a plain-language summary, not exceeding 100 words, of the proposed rule, which shall be posted on the regulations.gov website.
